channel.title: Comments on: From the George Mann Archives: La Cienega Restaurant Row

item.title: By: Neal Sausen
item.dc:creator: Neal Sausen
item.description: II remember growing up around all these places I was right down the street from Wan Q and Did in deed eat there on occasion I remember all those restaurants from the 1950s on restaurant Row back in the day when food was real food! Iâ€ve only posted this once
